q: Howard Stern made a shocking allegation while appearing on the Late Show with David Letterman . Howard Stern told David Letterman and the Late Show viewers that Regis Philbin didn't really retire, he was fired. He got fired. He went in and he asked for more money and they gave poor old Regis Philbin the boot, said Howard Stern . "I don't want to hear that. I don't want to believe that," said David Letterman . Donald Rumsfeld , who served as President Bush 's defense chief for six years after holding the the same job under president Gerald Ford in the 1970s, acknowledged that in a war, many things cost lives. But he had no regrets about his leadership of the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan-- the latter now nearing its 10th anniversary.
